title: Exact calculation of quantizer constants for arbitrary lattices. (arXiv:2211.01987v1 [cs.IT])
description: We present an algorithm for the computer-aided analytical construction of the Voronoi cells of lattices with known symmetry group. This algorithm is applied to the Coxeter-Todd lattice $K_{12}$ as well as to a family of lattices obtained from laminating $K_{12}$. This way, we obtain a locally optimal lattice quantizer in 13 dimensions representing a new best quantizer among the lattices with published exact quantizer constants.
dc:creator: Daniel Pook-Kolb, Bruce Allen, Erik Agrell
